product.title: None Listed All-in-One Air Styler - Auto Curl, Straighten, Volumize, Dry - 160000 RPM High-Speed for Faster Styling - Reduces Heat Damage & Frizz Hair Styling Irons - Ionic Blow Dryer Brush for All Types
product.title_excluding_brand: All-in-One Air Styler - Auto Curl, Straighten, Volumize, Dry - 160000 RPM High-Speed for Faster Styling - Reduces Heat Damage & Frizz Hair Styling Irons - Ionic Blow Dryer Brush for All Types
product.description: [Coanda Airflow for Effortless Styling – No Extreme Heat] Powered by high-speed airflow, this styler uses advanced Coanda effect technology to gently attract and wrap hair around the curler or brush surface. It styles using air, not clamps or high heat, reducing damage while delivering a glossy, frizz-free finish that lasts — all without the burn. [4 Styling Attachments for Any Look] This set includes five attachments to meet all your styling needs. The Auto Air Curler (1.2" & 1.5") automatically wraps hair with airflow and lets you switch curl direction by simply twisting the top — perfect for creating effortless curls or waves. The Firm and Soft Volumizing Brushes add lift and fullness for different hair textures. The Smoothing Brush tames flyaways for a sleek, polished look. The Hair Dryer removes moisture quickly to prep hair for styling. One tool, endless styles. [Smart Heat Control – Gentle on Hair, Strong on Style] An intelligent heat sensor monitors airflow temperature over 110 times per second to keep heat under 170°F (approx. 77°C), helping to prevent heat damage while locking in shape. You’ll enjoy smooth, defined results with natural shine — without sacrificing hair health. [For All Hair Types – Fast, Easy, and Long-Lasting] Whether your hair is fine, thick, straight, wavy, or curly, this all-in-one styler delivers fast, salon-quality results without needing multiple hot tools. Powerful airflow, a lightweight body, and ergonomic controls make styling effortless. Your perfect look is just minutes away — and lasts up to 12 hours. [Ongoing Support & Peace of Mind] We stand behind every product with long-term protection and responsive support. Whether you need help with setup, styling tips, or replacement assistance, our team is here for you — anytime. Your satisfaction means everything, and we’ll always be just a message away.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
